net.proteusframework.users.model.dao

Class PrincipalContactUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.users.model.dao.PrincipalContactUtil

  • public class PrincipalContactUtil
extends Object
    A utility class for getting and setting information about a principal's contact. Useful when the contact might be null
    Author:
    Greg Dick (gdick@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrincipalContactUtil

    • Method Detail

      • addAddress

        public static boolean addAddress(Principal p,
                 Address address)
        Utility method add an address to a contact. This will check existing addresses before adding the new one. If an existing address is found that equals the new one, this will do nothing. If the principal does not have a contact, a new one will be created. This change will not be persisted. This will do nothing if the address is null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        address - the address, may be null.
        Returns:
        true if the new address was added, false if not.

      • addEmailAddress

        public static boolean addEmailAddress(Principal p,
                      EmailAddress emailAddress)
        Utility method add an email address to a contact. This will check existing email addresses before adding the new one. If an existing email address is found that equals the new one, this will do nothing. If the principal does not have a contact, a new one will be created. This change will not be persisted. This will do nothing if the email address is null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        emailAddress - the email address, may be null.
        Returns:
        true if the new email address was added, false if not.

      • addPhoneNumber

        public static boolean addPhoneNumber(Principal p,
                     PhoneNumber phoneNumber)
        Utility method add a phone number to a contact. This will check existing phone numbers before adding the new one. If an existing phone number is found that equals the new one, this will do nothing. If the principal does not have a contact, a new one will be created. This change will not be persisted. This will do nothing if the phone number is null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        phoneNumber - the phone number, may be null.
        Returns:
        true if the new phone number was added, false if not.

      • getAddress

        public static Address getAddress(Principal p,
                 AddressType type)
        Get the last added address for the Principal's Contact of the given AddressType.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null
        type - the address type
        Returns:
        Address or null if one could not be found

      • getAddress

        public static Address getAddress(Principal p,
                 ContactDataCategory category)
        Utility method to get an address of a certain category. Will return the first address with a matching category in the address list or null if none exists. If the principal doesn't have a contact, this will return null. If the principal is null, this will return null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        category - the category, cannot be null
        Returns:
        first matching address or null

      • getAddresses

        public static List<Address> getAddresses(Principal p)
        Get the addresses for the Principal's Contact. If the principal doesn't have a contact, this will return an immutable empty list. If the principal is null, this will return an immutable empty list. The list returned will always be unmodifiable.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of Address. Never returns null.

      • getAddresses

        public static List<Address> getAddresses(Principal p,
                         AddressType type)
        Get the addresses for the Principal's Contact. If the principal doesn't have a contact, this will return an immutable empty list. If the principal is null, this will return an immutable empty list. The list returned will always be unmodifiable.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        type - the address type
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of Address. Never returns null.

      • getBirthDate

        public static Date getBirthDate(Principal p)
        Get the birth date for the Principal's Contact. If the principal doesn't have a contact, this will return null. If the principal is null, this will return null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        the date or null.

      • getCompany

        public static Organization getCompany(Principal p)
        Get the company for the Principal's Contact. If the principal doesn't have a contact or if the principal is null, this will return null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        Organization or null.

      • getCompanyName

        public static String getCompanyName(Principal p)
        Get the company name for the Principal's Contact. If the name, company, contact, or principal are null, this will return an empty string. This will never return null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        The company name or empty string. Will never be null.

      • getDepartment

        public static String getDepartment(Principal p)
        Get the department for the Principal's Contact. If the department, contact, or principal are null, this will return an empty string. This will never return null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        The department or empty string. Will never be null.

        public static EmailAddress getEmailAddress(Principal user,
                           ContactDataCategory... category)
        Get an email address.
        Parameters:
        user - the user. May be null.
        category - categories to search.
        Returns:
        return the first email address that matches the category.

      • getEmailAddress

        public static EmailAddress getEmailAddress(Principal p,
                           ContactDataCategory category)
        Utility method to get an email address of a certain category. Will return the first email address with a matching category in the address list or null if none exists. If the principal doesn't have a contact, this will return null. If the principal is null, this will return null.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        category - the category, cannot be null
        Returns:
        first matching address or null

      • getEmailAddresses

        public static List<EmailAddress> getEmailAddresses(Principal p)
        Get the email addresses for the Principal's Contact. If the principal is null or if the principal's contact is null, this will return an immutable empty list. The list returned will always be unmodifiable.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of EmailAddress. Never returns null.

        Parameters:

      • getTitle

        public static String getTitle(Principal p)

        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        the form of address or empty string. Never returns null.

      • isContactEmpty

        public static boolean isContactEmpty(Principal p)
        Check if the Principal's contact is empty. Will return true if the principal, or the principal's contact is null.

        A contact is considered not empty if any of its fields (excluding those listed below) have been changed from the default. The following fields do not affect empty status:

        • Contact.getPreferredLocale()
        • Contact.getPreferredTimeZone()

        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        Returns:
        true if the contact is empty or null or if the principal is null. False otherwise.

      • isOptin

        public static boolean isOptin(Principal p)
        Get the optin value for the Principal's Contact. If the principal doesn't have a contact, or if the principal is null, this will return false.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null
        Returns:
        true or false

      • removeEmailAddress

        public static boolean removeEmailAddress(Principal p,
                         EmailAddress ea)
        Remove the email address from the principal's Contact. Returns true if the email address existed and was removed. Returns false if the principal, contact, or email address are null or if the email address wasn't in the contact's list of email addresses.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, may be null.
        ea - the email address, may be null.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • setAddress

        public static void setAddress(Principal p,
              ContactDataCategory category,
              Address address)
        Utility method to set an address of a certain category. Will modify the first address with a matching category in the address list or add to the list if no match is found. If the principal does not have a contact, a new one will be created. This change will not be persisted.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        category - the category, cannot be null.
        address - the address, may be null.

      • setBirthDate

        public static void setBirthDate(Principal p,
                Date d)
        Set the birth date for the Principal's Contact. If the principal doesn't have a contact, one will be created. This change will not be persisted.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        d - the birth date, may be null.

      • setCompany

        public static void setCompany(Principal p,
              Organization company)
        Set the company for the Principal's Contact. If the principal doesn't have a contact, one will be created. This change will not be persisted.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null
        company - the company, may be null

      • setCompanyName

        public static void setCompanyName(Principal p,
                  String name)
        Set the name of the principal's contact's company. If the contact or the contact's Organization does not exist, this will create a new one and attach it to the principal. This will not persist the change.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        name - the company name, may be null.

      • setDepartment

        public static void setDepartment(Principal p,
                 String name)
        Set the department of the principal's contact. If the contact does not exist, this will create a new one and attach it to the principal. This will not persist the change.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        name - the position, may be null.

      • setEmailAddress

        public static void setEmailAddress(Principal p,
                   ContactDataCategory category,
                   EmailAddress ea)
        Utility method to set an email address of a certain category. If the principal does not have a contact, one will be created. This will not persist the contact. Will modify the first email address with a matching category in the email address list or add to the list if no match is found.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        category - the category.
        ea - the address, may be null.

      • setEmailAddress

        public static void setEmailAddress(Principal p,
                   ContactDataCategory category,
                   String address)
        Utility method to set an email address of a certain category. If the principal does not have a contact, one will be created. This will not persist the contact. Will modify the first email address with a matching category in the email address list or add to the list if no match is found.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        category - the category
        address - the email address as a string

      • setFirstName

        public static void setFirstName(Principal p,
                String name)
        Set the first name of the principal's Contact. If the contact or the contact's Name does not exist, this will create a new one and attach it to the principal. This will not persist the change.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        name - the first name, may be null.

        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        name - the formatted name, may be null.

      • setPhoneNumber

        public static void setPhoneNumber(Principal p,
                  PhoneNumberType type,
                  ContactDataCategory category,
                  PhoneNumber number)
        Utility method to set a phone number. Will either add the phone number to the list or modify the first matching instance of a PhoneNumber based on matching the type and category.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null
        type - the phone number type
        category - the phone number category
        number - the phone number. may be null

      • setPosition

        public static void setPosition(Principal p,
               String name)
        Set the position of the principal's contact. If the contact does not exist, this will create a new one and attach it to the principal. This will not persist the change.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        name - the position, may be null.

      • setPreferredLocale

        public static void setPreferredLocale(Principal p,
                      Locale preferredLocale)
        Set the preferred locale on the Principal's Contact. If the contact doesn't exist, a new one will be created. The change will not be persisted.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal, cannot be null.
        preferredLocale - the locale, may be null.

        Parameters:

        tz - the preferred timezone, may be null.
